title: Number of years as a top under-aided country
subtitle: The number of years a country has been defined as a top under-aided country over the period from 2006 to 2016. Top under-aided countries are defined by the OECD are those which are are "underfunded" by need relative to others.
sourceDesc: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
internalNotes: For OECD report - do not delete.
